name: Time-Based Variations
description: Environmental modifiers that adjust scenarios based on time of day. These affect lighting, visibility, and risk scoring.

modifiers.name: Dawn / Early Morning
modifiers.prompt_description: Early morning at dawn, soft golden light beginning to illuminate the scene, long soft shadows, sky transitioning from dark to light blue and orange

camera_adjustments.exposure_note: Camera may auto-adjust from night mode

risk_modifier.notes: Slightly elevated risk due to low foot traffic and transitional lighting

modifiers.name: Daytime
modifiers.prompt_description: Bright daytime with full natural sunlight, clear visibility, normal shadows cast by objects and people

risk_modifier.notes: Baseline risk level, best visibility for identification

modifiers.name: Late Afternoon
modifiers.prompt_description: Late afternoon with warm golden sunlight, lengthening shadows, slightly lower sun angle

camera_adjustments.exposure_note: May have some glare from low sun angle

risk_modifier.notes: Standard daytime visibility, some areas may have deep shadows

modifiers.name: Dusk / Evening
modifiers.prompt_description: Evening at dusk, fading daylight with orange and purple sky, increasing darkness, porch lights and streetlights beginning to turn on

risk_modifier.notes: Reduced visibility, identification more difficult, elevated baseline risk

modifiers.name: Night
modifiers.prompt_description: Nighttime with artificial lighting from porch lights and streetlights, dark sky, pools of light surrounded by darkness, harsh shadows from directional light sources

camera_adjustments.exposure_note: IR mode or low-light mode active

risk_modifier.notes: Significantly reduced visibility, facial recognition difficult, higher baseline risk

modifiers.name: Late Night / Midnight
modifiers.prompt_description: Late night / early morning hours, minimal ambient light, very dark with only security lights and distant streetlights, high contrast between lit and unlit areas

camera_adjustments.exposure_note: Full IR mode, grayscale image typical

risk_modifier.notes: Lowest visibility, any activity highly suspicious, maximum risk modifier

usage.application: Apply time modifiers by merging environment_settings with base scenario environment. Add risk_modifier.factors_to_add to expected risk factors.
usage.prompt_integration: Insert prompt_description into the generation prompt to describe lighting conditions.
